name: core-enforcer
caption: Core Enforcer

effect.short: Nullifies the target's ability if it moves earlier.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  If the target has already moved this turn, its ability is nullified.

flavorText:
If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on
have already used their moves, this move eliminates
the effect of the target’s Ability.
